ca.encodeous.pong.system

Class PongSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.encodeous.pong.system.GameSystem
      • ca.encodeous.pong.system.PongSystem

  • public class PongSystem
extends GameSystem
    A specialized GameSystem for the Pong game, with specialized methods This class provides further game events that are specific to pong
